Subject: Attention Everyone!

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 710
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Yanshosh@...

Ok, now that almost everyone has an account, I'm going to start
accepting official declarations of people running for the Council.
Right now I'm asking for two things:

1. If you're running, send me an email saying that you're running, and
name the two supporters you got.
2. If you're supporting someone, send me an email saying who you're
supporting. Remember, if you're running, you can support one person,
if you're not running, you can support two people.

I will be accepting emails all through tomorrow. At that point, I will
set up the poll at the site and the voting will begin. If you don't
have a username and password for the site, get one from me, or else
you won't be able to get into the polls.
